name: deserializeAvro
description: Converts an Avro data representation into CFML data.

params.name: readerSchema
params.description: The Avro schema as a string or the absolute path to the schema

params.name: strictMapping
params.description: Specifies whether to convert the Avro strictly. If true, converts the Avro binary to matching ColdFusion data types.

links.title: Avro and Protocol Buffer in ColdFusion
links.description: Overview of Avro and Protobuf, including how to use them in ColdFusion

examples.title: Deserialize an Avro serialized query (Script syntax)
